eladar Longspear was a male warrior member of the Zhentilar in High Dale.
Heladar fought for Zhentil Keep in Daggerdale and in the conquest of the Citadel of the Raven. In 1358 DR, Heladar commanded a small Zhent occupation army that secretly conquered High Dale. However, Elminster Aumar and Sharantyr casually discovered the Zhent plot regarding the dale and started an insurrection in which Heladar was killed by the Harpers Itharr and Belkram.
